abstract: The July issue of IEEE Spectruman article on cellphone technology that reads like a spy thriller. Because it is. A look at how the cellphone of the Greek prime minister was bugged and questions about whether that could happen in the United States.
snippet: The July issue of IEEE Spectruman article on cellphone technology that reads like a spy thriller. Because it is. A look at how the cellphone of the Greek prime minister was bugged and questions about whether that could happen in the United States.
lead_paragraph: The July issue of IEEE Spectrum, a journal published by the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers, has an article on cellphone technology that reads like a spy thriller. Because it is.

headline.main: Engineers as Counterspies: How the Greek Cellphone System Was Bugged
